title: Pixel 3a XL No Signal / Radio wont turn on
content:
Hi everyone,
I have had my pixel 3a XL for a while now without any problems untill yesterday.
Out of the blue my signal stopped. Found out my cell radio won't turn on. When i toggle it it goes back to off. my IEMI is not blocked and theres nothing wrong according to my providers app.
What have it tried:
rebooting the phone
resetting the network settings
factory resetted the whole phone
booted into safe mode and pressed the toggle
removed SIM (and reinserted it after a clean)
rolled back to the march and the june update
reflashed the july update

Anyone any idea's

Kind Regards
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
